channel.title: Comments on: “Cracks and Fissures”: Emily Wilson’s Translation of the Odyssey
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Suz
item.dc:creator: Suz
item.description: Oh, thank you for this! I’m a Fagles fan but have heard good things about Wilson’s translation. Now I’m even more excited about it!
item.content:encoded: Oh, thank you for this! I’m a Fagles fan but have heard good things about Wilson’s translation. Now I’m even more excited about it!
